description: Orchard problem with 5 trees in a row (may not have all been proved optimal).
references: S. A. Burr, B. Grünbaum and N. J. A. Sloane, The Orchard Problem, Geometriae Dedicata, 2 (1974), 397-424.
M. Gardner, Time Travel and Other Mathematical Bewilderments. Freeman, NY, 1988, Chap. 22.
links: S. A. Burr, B. Grünbaum and N. J. A. Sloane, The Orchard Problem, Geometriae Dedicata, 2 (1974), 397-424.
P. Berloquin, a(21) >= 12 (from an article in Jeux & Strategies from 1983 - see Fig. 13)
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Orchard-Planting Problem
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
